name: Hardtek
description: Modern version of the "tribecore" sound featuring deep alternating basses and festival EDM-influenced drops.

children.name: Raggatek
children.description: Influenced by Reggae, Ragga and Dancehall, combining half-time instrumental sections with Hardtek's fast four-on-the-floor rhythms, as well as vocal samples, clean basslines and skank rhythms.
